definition: soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to open out, to expand/bright, glorious
boiled balls of glutinous rice flour, eaten during the Lantern Festival
chicken stock/chicken soup/(fig.) chicken soup for the soul – i.e. feel-good motivational stories (often used disparagingly because the stories don't really effect change in people's lives)
to dawdle/to go slow deliberately/to fizzle out/to have all one's hopes dashed/(Tw) to have a soak in a hot spring
different broth but the same old medicine (idiom); a change in name only/a change in form but not in substance
secure as a city protected by a wall of metal and a moat of boiling water (idiom)/well fortified/invulnerable to attack

sentences.english: Which soup do you want? We have Eggdrop Soup with Sliced Tomatoes, Famous Hot &Sour Soup.
sentences.chinese: 您來點什麼湯？我們有番茄蛋花湯，酸辣湯。

sentences.english: I would like to have a fried diced chicken with peanuts, rice and soup.
sentences.chinese: 我要一個宮保雞丁，要米飯，還有一份湯。

sentences.english: ShangMingYang father came to visit troops, both father and son a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 湯名揚的爸爸來到部隊探望兒子，父子二人促膝談心。

sentences.english: 'What about sending a message via email?' suggested Mr. Tompkins.
sentences.chinese: “如果是發送一條電子郵件消息呢？”湯普金斯建議。

sentences.english: Nobody but you likes tomato soup.
sentences.chinese: 除了你沒人喜愛番茄湯。

sentences.english: You'll feel good to have some soup after a meal.
sentences.chinese: 小朋友喫完飯後要喝一碗湯這樣會感覺很舒服的。

sentences.english: Which do you prefer, sour peppery soup or four-jewel soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡什麼湯，酸辣湯還是四寶湯？

sentences.english: Clinical Study on the Pathogenic Characters of Extremity Superficial Thrombophlebitis;
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察散瘀止痛湯治療血栓性靜脈炎的效果。

sentences.english: The King sent over a package of powder for dressing the wounds together with a cup of ginseng soup for easing pain.
sentences.chinese: 國王命人賜了一包棒瘡藥，又送了一盞定痛人蔘湯。

sentences.english: To the star chau fry flour and wonton soup.
sentences.chinese: 要了星洲炒粉和雲吞湯。

sentences.english: Tanggangzi geothermal field is controlled by Hanling deep crustal fracture.
sentences.chinese: 湯崗子地熱田受活動性深斷裂寒嶺殼斷裂的控制。

sentences.english: VOICE: And what did he say about religion?
sentences.chinese: 湯斯博士是怎麼形容信仰的呢？

sentences.english: Served with Chinese daily soup, seasonal vegetable, fruit and green tea.
sentences.chinese: 本幫糖醋排骨飯配以中式老火湯，時蔬，水果及綠茶。

sentences.english: Is Chinese soup bad for health?
sentences.chinese: 老火湯，對身體有益還是有害？

sentences.english: Conclusion Qingjinzhike - soup has better therapeutic efficacy on coughing due to wind - heat in children.
sentences.chinese: 結論清金止咳湯治療小兒外感風熱咳嗽具有良好效果。

sentences.english: Is also the March Eighth delivers you ten catties iron. Boils the pot nutrition soup makes up the calcium the blood tonic.
sentences.chinese: 又是三八節，送你十斤鐵熬鍋營養湯，補鈣又補血。

definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head

the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
chicken stock/chicken soup/(fig.) chicken soup for the soul – i.e. feel-good motivational stories (often used disparagingly because the stories don't really effect change in people's lives)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
